narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Exceptional Persons INC is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Waterloo, IA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $80.2M in Medicaid payments across 428K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $80.2M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
